title: Real-time Anomaly Detection System for Financial Transactions
description: Led the creation of an anomaly detection system for financial transactions, utilizing Azure Databricks, ADLS, PySpark to process the data, resulting in enhanced fraud detection accuracy.

title: Data Modeling and Management for Industrial Manufacturer
description: Developed a relational database using MySQL & Microsoft SQL Server for a Beer manufacturer, implementing Data Modelling techniques like Star schema, Snowflake Schema and query optimization techniques that improved the performance by 30%

title: Sales Data Analysis and Reporting
description: Conducted analysis on customer sales behavior data to pinpoint trends and pull out opportunities for a retail client, leveraging Power BI to craft interactive dashboards that offer stakeholders real-time insights into sales performance, while employing DAX expressions for data manipulation and cleaning

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: Developed a fully blown portfolio dynamic and interactive website which allows recruiters,employers,stakeholders to view and interact with my experiences to know me better
